facts.1: Mole Day is celebrated between 6:02 AM and 6:02 PM on October 23rd, in honor of Avogadro's number (6.02 x 10^23).
facts.2: The day was created to foster interest in chemistry, particularly among students.
facts.3: The American Chemical Society sponsors Mole Day activities and events.

facts.1: The Boston Cream Pie was created by French chef Sanzian at Boston's Parker House Hotel in 1856.
facts.2: Despite its name, Boston Cream Pie is actually a cake, not a pie.
facts.3: In 1996, the Boston Cream Pie was declared the official dessert of Massachusetts.

Day 3.title: National TV Talk Show Host Day

facts.1: National TV Talk Show Host Day is celebrated on October 23rd in honor of Johnny Carson's birthday, one of the most iconic talk show hosts.
facts.2: Johnny Carson hosted 'The Tonight Show' for 30 years, from 1962 to 1992.
facts.3: Talk shows have been a staple of American television since the 1950s, with hosts like Oprah Winfrey, David Letterman, and Ellen DeGeneres becoming household names.
